source(output(
		EngagementId as string,
		CrmInstanceId as string,
		SalesProgramId as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		ModifiedById as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		TenantId as integer,
		OdsCreatedDate as timestamp,
		OdsModifiedDate as timestamp,
		OdsStatus as integer,
		VersionNumber as long,
		PlatformCreatedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDateAsInt as long,
		extractid as string,
		extractdatetime as timestamp,
		loadts as timestamp,
		deltaactioncode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> engagementsaleprogram
source(output(
		EngagementMilestoneID as string,
		CrmInstanceId as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		ModifiedById as string,

		EngagementID as string,

		TransactionCurrencyId as string,
		TenantId as integer,
		OdsCreatedDate as timestamp,
		OdsModifiedDate as timestamp,
		OdsStatus as integer,
		VersionNumber as long,
		MilestoneNumber as string,
		statecode as integer,
		Status as string,
		StatusSeqNo as long,
		statuscode as integer,

		StatusReasonSeqNo as long,

		scrumescalationSeqNo as long,

		milestonesolutionareaSeqNo as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cseo',
	folderPath: 'standardized/transactional/msx/hub_vw_engagementmilestone/v1/standard') ~> Milestone
source(output(
		EngagementId as string,
		CrmInstanceId as string,
		SystemUserId as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		ModifiedById as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		TenantId as integer,
		OdsCreatedDate as timestamp,
		OdsModifiedDate as timestamp,
		OdsStatus as integer,
		VersionNumber as long,
		PlatformCreatedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDateAsInt as long,
		extractid as string,
		extractdatetime as timestamp,
		loadts as timestamp,
		deltaactioncode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cseo',
	folderPath: 'standardized/transactional/msx/hub_vw_engagementteam/v1/standard') ~> EngagementTeam
Engagement, engagementsaleprogram exists(Engagement@EngagementId == engagementsaleprogram@EngagementId,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Milestone, engagementsaleprogram exists(Milestone@EngagementID == engagementsaleprogram@EngagementId,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
EngagementTeam, engagementsaleprogram exists(EngagementTeam@EngagementId == engagementsaleprogram@EngagementId,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists4
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Exists2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
Exists4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
